scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a pastoral landscape under an arched frame adorned with floral motifs and gold leaf. In the foreground, a flock of sheep grazes, accompanied by a dog. Two shepherds, one kneeling and looking upwards with clasped hands, and another reaching out towards a seated woman, are present. The woman, dressed in a blue gown, holds a lamb. Above them, an angel with wings outstretched hovers, unfurling a scroll that reads "Gloria in excelsis Deo". The background features rolling hills and a rocky outcrop.
